results.title: Use of metformin and survival of patients with high-grade glioma.
results.text_hl: In conclusion, use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is associated with better overall and progression-free survival of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Astrocytoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001254 @@@WHO grade III@@@.
